Keywords: Armor , Future , Gotham City , Green Lantern Corps , Herald , Justice League , Justice Society , Mystical , Politician
Real Name: Alan Scott
Special Powers
OAN AMBASSADOR TO THE U.N.: Leadership. // When Green Lantern uses Defend, Leadership, or JSA team ability, he considers friendly characters within range and line of fire to be adjacent. // Once per turn when a friendly character within range is targeted by an attack, you may roll a d6. If you do, that character positively modifies their defense value equal to half the result for that attack.
